body.p:
SAM. C. HUGHES,
ATTORNEY AT LAW,
MORGANFIELD, KY.
Will practice in the Courts of Union and the adjoining Counties. All Collecting Business promptly attended to.

Morganfield, Ky.
March 5th 1863.
Gov Robinson or
W W Gardner.
Gentlemen

In case the decision of the Governor should be in ^my^ favor, in regard to the petition which was presented to him by Mr Gardner and Mr Bell -- I enclose the order of the court regulating the dates left blank in the petition --
